basics.name: Nick Walker
basics.label: Ph.D. Student in Computer Science
basics.summary: Nick Walker is a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at the University of Washington in Seattle.

highlights: Developed assignments and supported undergraduates using the Kuri robot for their robotics capstone course
Developed experimental brain-computer interface software and hardware
Work contributed to a SPIE conference publication
Characterized the performance of automated speech transcription vendors
Developed evaluation methodology that led to a patent application
